name: Nightwatch (Brallex)
description:
As a nightwatch, you thought your shift would look like any other - nothing to report.
As an experienced thief, you thought this job would be as any other - undisturbed.
But not this time.

You or your friend are going to try to steal as much as you can from safes that are spread out in different rooms.
Meanwhile the other is trying to catch you red-handed.
Whenever you think you have enough money, flee from the place before you get caught!

Then you switch places.
The one that stole for the highest value wins.

Thief Controls:

  • Move - WASD
  • Action - E
  • Flashlight - F

Nightwatch Controls:

  • Move - ARROWS
  • Arrest - SPACE
